definition[0]: two people who are incompatible have such different characters, beliefs etc that they cannot have a friendly relationship
example[0]: I don’t know why they ever got married. They’re totally incompatible.
definition[1]: two things that are incompatible cannot exist or be accepted together
example[1]: Politeness and truth are often mutually incompatible.
example[2]: Business interests are incompatible with public office.
definition[2]: two things that are incompatible are of different types and so cannot be used together
example[4]: The laser printer is incompatible with the new computer.
definition[3]: computers, computer systems, or programs that are incompatible cannot be used together
example[5]: Most PCs in Japan run on software based on NEC Corp’s architecture, which is incompatible with IBM machines.
